personalInfo.name: Rakshit Bharatbhai Patel
personalInfo.role: Sr Full-Stack Developer (React/Vue Full Stack with Node)

professionalSummary: Innovative Sr Full-Stack Developer with {yearsOfExperience} years of experience specializing in React, Node.js, and JavaScript frameworks. Proven track record in leading complex projects for global clients, including high-traffic e-commerce platforms. Expert in IoT, CRM systems, and data visualization tools. Recognized for technical innovation, team leadership, and delivering scalable, high-performance solutions. Strong problem-solver with excellent communication skills and a unique background in performing arts, enhancing public speaking and team collaboration abilities.
